title: The Belfry Witches Fly Again
description: The village of Tranters End was once a sleepy, peaceful place. That is until Old Noshie and Skirty Marm blew in on their broomsticks and started causing magical mayhem! Now there’s a cauldron of trouble brewing – with some particularly strange ingredients. Throw in snow in summer, Power Hats and a mad mystery tour to the Upright Tower of Pisa, and the result is three fantastically funny stories guaranteed to bewitch young readers.
author: kate-saunders
